moduleDescription.title: Audit
moduleDescription.name: Audit
moduleDescription.description: JASP for Audit (JfA) is an officially supported add-on module that is designed specifically with the auditor in mind. JfA helps the auditor in interpreting, explaining, and reporting the analyses and leaves a transparent audit trail.
moduleDescription.author: Koen Derks, Jacques de Swart , Eric-Jan Wagenmakers, Jan Wille & Ruud Wetzels
